archimate:CourseOfAction.name: Course of Action
archimate:CourseOfAction.documentation: A Course of Action represents an approach or plan for configuring some capabilities and resources of the enterprise, undertaken to achieve a goal.

properties.value: The pattern or plan that integrates an organization's major goals, policies, and action sequences into a cohesive whole.
Direction and focus provided by strategic goals and objectives, often to deliver the value proposition characterized in the business model.
